title: Enforce UpperCamelCase naming convention
description: Enforces UpperCamelCase naming convention

title: Enforce lowerCamelCase naming convention
description: Enforces lowerCamelCase naming convention

title: Enforce either UpperCamelCase or lowerCamelCase naming convention
description: Global constants should follow either UpperCamelCase or lowerCamelCase naming conventions

title: Prohibit k-prefixed constants
description: Prohibits k-prefixed constants

title: Enforce a single space before and after '->'
description: Enforces a single space before and after '->'

title: Prohibit whitespace around angle brackets
description: Prohibits whitespace immediately before/after an opening chevron < and before the closing chevron >

title: Enforce whitespace surrounding the colon
description: Enforces no whitespace preceding the colon and exactly one whitespace after the colon

title: Enforce whitespace surrounding the comma
description: Enforces no whitespace preceding the colon and exactly one whitespace after the comma

title: Enforce whitespace surrounding operators
description: Enforces single space around operator in operator declarations

title: Enforce that source files begin with a non-whitespace character
description: Enforces that source files begin with a non-whitespace character

title: Prohibit whitespace  before/after an opening parenthesis and before the closing parenthesis
description: Prohibits whitespace before/after an opening parenthesis and before the closing parenthesis

title: Enforce that source files terminate with exactly one \n character
description: Enforces that source files terminate with exactly one \n character

title: Prohibit whitespace after the last non-whitespace
description: Prohibits whitespace after the last non-whitespace character on each line until the newline

title: Enforce at least one whitespace character after a comment opening symbol
description: Enforces at least one whitespace character after a comment opening symbol

title: Enforce one blank line before and after every function and method declaration
description: Enforces one blank line before and after every function and method declaration

title: Enforce a line limit on the lengths of class bodies
description: Enforces a line limit on the lengths of class bodies

title: Enforce a line limit on the lengths of closure bodies
description: Enforces a line limit on the lengths of closure bodies

title: Enforce a line limit on the length of each file
description: Enforces a line limit on the length of each file

title: Enforce a line limit on the lengths of function bodies
description: Enforces a line limit on the lengths of function bodies

title: Enforce a line limit on the lengths of struct bodies
description: Enforces a line limit on the lengths of struct bodies

title: Enforce a character limit on the length of each line
description: Enforces a character limit on the length of each line

title: Enforce a character limit on the maximum length of a name
description: Enforces a character limit on the maximum length of a name

title: Enforce a character limit on the minimum length of a name
description: Enforces a character limit on the minimum length of a name

title: Prohibit parentheses around control flow constructs, exception handling constructs, and initializers
description: Prohibits parentheses around control flow constructs, exception handling constructs, and initializers

title: Enforce the One True Brace Style
description: Enforces the One True Brace Style (1TBS)

title: Prohibit using the forced form of the type cast operator
description: Prohibits using the forced form of the type cast operator (as!)

title: Prohibit multiple import statements on a single line
description: Prohibits multiple import statements on a single line

title: Prohibit multiple statements on a single line
description: Prohibits multiple statements on a single line

title: Enforce TODO comments syntax
description: Enforce TODO comments syntax

title: Prohibit consecutive var/let bindings on optional binding lists
description: Prohibits consecutive var/let bindings on optional binding lists

title: Enforce trailing closure syntax for the last argument of a function
description: Enforces trailing closure syntax for the last argument of a function
